overview: When Yusuf last toured Australia 36 years ago, it was as the enigmatic Cat Stevens, a singer songwriter who brought the world so many folk-pop hits. In 2010 he returned to Australia, reminding us that the voice that inspired the dreams of a generation is still as timeless as ever. His tour of Australia and New Zealand saw 85,000 awe-struck fans mesmerised by him.
title: Yusuf Roadsinger Live in Australia
